title: Away from home: Canadian writers in exotic places
description: Travel the world with some of Canada's best writers...Hail a cab in New York with Hugh MacLennan; wander through Casablanca with A.M. Klein; explore the heart of Paris with Morley Callaghan; join Gwendolyn MacEwan on the trail of Odysseus in Greece; see London as only Stephen Leacock could show it; and enjoy other fascinating journeys with Norman Levine, Charles Ritchie, Ethel Wilson, Mordecai Richler, George Woodcock, Malcolm Lowry and many more.
author: Kildare Dobbs
